typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id_cliente as integer,
		nome as string,
		idade as string,
		data_nascimento as string,
		tipo as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(id_cliente >= 0,
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(principal, baseMaxId)
ConditionalSplit1@baseMaxId select(mapColumn(
		id_cliente
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(id_cliente = max(id_cliente)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
